containerDefinitions.name: update-oauth
command: const{PrismaClient}=require('@prisma/client');const p=new PrismaClient();async function main(){const client=await p.oAuthClient.findUnique({where:{clientId:'ssim-client'}});if(!client){console.log('Client not found');return;}console.log('Current:',JSON.stringify(client.redirectUris));const newUri='https://ssim.banksim.ca/payment/callback';if(client.redirectUris.includes(newUri)){console.log('URI already exists');return;}const updated=await p.oAuthClient.update({where:{clientId:'ssim-client'},data:{redirectUris:[...client.redirectUris,newUri]}});console.log('Updated:',JSON.stringify(updated.redirectUris));}main().catch(e=>console.error('Error:',e.message)).finally(()=>p.$disconnect());
